00046   const char *usage[] = {
00047     "usage: count_stored <table>",
00048     "",
00049     "  This program counts the number of cells that exist in CellStores",
00050     "  for a table.  It does this by reading the Files columns for the",
00051     "  table in the METADATA table to learn of all the CellStores.  It",
00052     "  then does a linear scan of each CellStore file, counting the",
00053     "  number of cells...",
00054     "",
00055     (const char *)0
00056   };
00057 
00058   typedef struct {
00059     std::string start_row;
00060     std::string end_row;
00061     std::vector<std::string> cell_stores;
00062   } RangeCellStoreInfoT;
00063 
00064   typedef struct {
00065     std::string start_row;
00066     std::string end_row;
00067     std::string file;
00068   } CellStoreInfoT;

00075 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00076   Comm *comm;
00077   ConnectionManagerPtr conn_manager_ptr;
00078   DfsBroker::Client *client;
00079   ClientPtr hypertable_client_ptr;
00080   std::vector<CellStoreInfoT> file_vector;
00081   const char *table_name = 0;
00082   bool hit_start = false;
00083   PropertiesPtr props_ptr;
00084   string config_file = "";
00085   CellStoreV0Ptr cell_store_ptr;
00086   ScanContextPtr scan_context_ptr( new ScanContext(END_OF_TIME) );
00087   ByteString key;
00088   ByteString value;
00089   uint64_t total_count = 0;
00090   uint64_t store_count = 0;
00091   const char *row;
00092 
00093   for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
00094     if (argv[i][0] == '-')
00095       Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00096     else if (table_name == 0)
00097       table_name = argv[i];
00098     else
00099       Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00100   }
00101 
00102   if (table_name == 0)
00103     Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00104 
00105   try {
00106     // Create Hypertable client object
00107     hypertable_client_ptr = new Client(argv[0]);
00108   }
00109   catch (std::exception &e) {
00110     cerr << "error: " << e.what() << endl;
00111     return 1;
00112   }
00113 
00114   if (config_file == "")
00115     config_file = System::installDir + "/conf/hypertable.cfg";
00116 
00117   props_ptr = new Properties(config_file);
00118 
00119   comm = new Comm();
00120   conn_manager_ptr = new ConnectionManager(comm);
00121 
00122   client = new DfsBroker::Client(conn_manager_ptr, props_ptr);
00123   if (!client->wait_for_connection(15)) {
00124     cerr << "error: timed out waiting for DFS broker" << endl;
00125     exit(1);
00126   }
00127 
00128   Global::blockCache = new FileBlockCache(200000000LL);
00129 
00130   fill_cell_store_vector(hypertable_client_ptr, table_name, file_vector);
00131 
00132   for (size_t i=0; i<file_vector.size(); i++) {
00133 
00137     cell_store_ptr = new CellStoreV0(client);
00138     CellListScanner *scanner = 0;
00139 
00140     if (cell_store_ptr->open(file_vector[i].file.c_str(), 0, 0) != 0)
00141       return 1;
00142 
00143     if (cell_store_ptr->load_index() != 0)
00144       return 1;
00145 
00146     hit_start = (file_vector[i].start_row == "") ? true : false;
00147 
00148     store_count = 0;
00149 
00150     scanner = cell_store_ptr->create_scanner(scan_context_ptr);
00151     while (scanner->get(key, value)) {
00152       row = key.str();
00153       if (!hit_start) {
00154         if (strcmp(row, file_vector[i].start_row.c_str()) <= 0) {
00155           scanner->forward();
00156           continue;
00157         }
00158         hit_start = true;
00159       }
00160       if (strcmp(row, file_vector[i].end_row.c_str()) > 0)
00161         break;
00162       store_count++;
00163       scanner->forward();
00164     }
00165     delete scanner;
00166 
00167     cout << store_count << "\t" << file_vector[i].file << "[" << file_vector[i].start_row << ".." << file_vector[i].end_row << "]" << endl;
00168     total_count += store_count;
00169 
00170   }
00171 
00172   cout << total_count << "\tTOTAL" << endl;
00173 
00174   return 0;
00175 }

00182 void fill_cell_store_vector(ClientPtr &hypertable_client_ptr, const char *table_name, std::vector<CellStoreInfoT> &file_vector) {
00183   TablePtr table_ptr;
00184   TableScannerPtr scanner_ptr;
00185   ScanSpec scan_spec;
00186   Cell cell;
00187   uint32_t table_id;
00188   char start_row[16];
00189   char end_row[16];
00190   RangeCellStoreInfoT range_cell_store_info;
00191   CellStoreInfoT cell_store_info;
00192 
00193   try {
00194 
00195     // Open the 'METADATA' table
00196     table_ptr = hypertable_client_ptr->open_table("METADATA");
00197 
00198     table_id = hypertable_client_ptr->get_table_id(table_name);
00199 
00200     // Set up the scan specification
00201     scan_spec.max_versions = 1;
00202     sprintf(start_row, "%d:", table_id);
00203     scan_spec.start_row = start_row;
00204     sprintf(end_row, "%d:%s", table_id, Key::END_ROW_MARKER);
00205     scan_spec.end_row = end_row;
00206     scan_spec.start_row_inclusive = scan_spec.end_row_inclusive = true;
00207     scan_spec.columns.clear();
00208     scan_spec.columns.push_back("Files");
00209     scan_spec.columns.push_back("StartRow");
00210 
00211     // Create a scanner on the 'METADATA' table 
00212     scanner_ptr = table_ptr->create_scanner(scan_spec);
00213 
00214   }
00215   catch (std::exception &e) {
00216     cerr << "error: " << e.what() << endl;
00217     exit(1);
00218   }
00219 
00220   range_cell_store_info.start_row = "";
00221   range_cell_store_info.end_row = "";
00222   range_cell_store_info.cell_stores.clear();
00223 
00224   // Iterate through the cells returned by the scanner
00225   while (scanner_ptr->next(cell)) {
00226     if (strcmp(cell.row_key, range_cell_store_info.end_row.c_str())) {
00227       if (range_cell_store_info.end_row != "") {
00228         const char *end_row_cstr = strchr(range_cell_store_info.end_row.c_str(), ':');
00229         if (end_row_cstr == 0) {
00230           cerr << "error: mal-formed end row (missing colon) - " << range_cell_store_info.end_row << endl;
00231           exit(1);
00232         }
00233         end_row_cstr++;
00234         cell_store_info.start_row = range_cell_store_info.start_row;
00235         cell_store_info.end_row = end_row_cstr;
00236         for (size_t i=0; i<range_cell_store_info.cell_stores.size(); i++) {
00237           cell_store_info.file = range_cell_store_info.cell_stores[i];
00238           file_vector.push_back(cell_store_info);
00239         }
00240       }
00241       range_cell_store_info.start_row = "";
00242       range_cell_store_info.end_row = cell.row_key;
00243       range_cell_store_info.cell_stores.clear();      
00244     }
00245 
00246     if (!strcmp(cell.column_family, "StartRow"))
00247       range_cell_store_info.start_row = std::string((const char *)cell.value, cell.value_len);
00248     else if (!strcmp(cell.column_family, "Files")) {
00249       std::string files = std::string((const char *)cell.value, cell.value_len);
00250       char *ptr, *save_ptr;
00251       ptr = strtok_r((char *)files.c_str(), "\n\r;", &save_ptr);
00252       while (ptr) {
00253         range_cell_store_info.cell_stores.push_back(ptr);
00254         ptr = strtok_r(0, "\n\r;", &save_ptr);
00255       }
00256     }
00257     else {
00258       cerr << "Unexpected column family encountered: '" << cell.column_family << endl;
00259       exit(1);
00260     }
00261   }
00262 
00263   if (!range_cell_store_info.cell_stores.empty()) {
00264     const char *end_row_cstr = strchr(range_cell_store_info.end_row.c_str(), ':');
00265     if (end_row_cstr == 0) {
00266       cerr << "error: mal-formed end row (missing colon) - " << range_cell_store_info.end_row << endl;
00267       exit(1);
00268     }
00269     end_row_cstr++;
00270     cell_store_info.start_row = range_cell_store_info.start_row;
00271     cell_store_info.end_row = end_row_cstr;
00272     for (size_t i=0; i<range_cell_store_info.cell_stores.size(); i++) {
00273       cell_store_info.file = range_cell_store_info.cell_stores[i];
00274       file_vector.push_back(cell_store_info);
00275     }
00276   }
00277 }
